description.raw:
‌

* filled out the SensorCompliance. It is formatted by the sensors\_compliance files
* styling
* added roslaunch params

thruster bounding boxes visualized

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3286679424-thrusters.png)
  
sensor bounding boxes visualized

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/482578878-comp_show.png)
number test and permitted parameters are configured by sensor\_compliance/numeric.yaml and thruster\_compliance/numeric.yaml

bounding boxes are configured by

sensor\_compliance/visual.sdf and thruster\_compliance/visual.sdf

example yamls:

sensor\_num\_fail will fail because too many cameras

```
wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: middle_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
wamv_3d_lidar:
    - name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}
```

sensor\_bounding fail will fail because one of the cameras is not in bounds:

```
wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 2
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
wamv_3d_lidar:
    - name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}
```

sensors config will work:

```
wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
wamv_3d_lidar:
    - name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}
```

thruster\_config will not fail:

```
engine:
    - prefix: "left"
      position: "-2.373776 1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "right"
      position: "-2.373776 -1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "middle"
      position: "-2.373776 0 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
```

thruster\_config\_num\_fail will fail due too too any engines

```
engine:
    - prefix: "aft_port"
      position: "-2.373776 1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "aft_star"
      position: "-2.373776 -1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "aft_center"
      position: "-2.373776 0 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "for_port"
      position: "1 .8 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "for_star"
      position: "1 -.8 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
```

thruster\_config\_bounding\_fail will fail due too bounding box:

```
engine:
    - prefix: "left"
      position: "-2.373776 1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "right"
      position: "-2.373776 -1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "middle"
      position: "2.373776 0 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"wamv
```
description.html:
‌

  • filled out the SensorCompliance. It is formatted by the sensors_compliance files
  • styling
  • added roslaunch params

thruster bounding boxes visualized

sensor bounding boxes visualized

number test and permitted parameters are configured by sensor_compliance/numeric.yaml and thruster_compliance/numeric.yaml

bounding boxes are configured by

sensor_compliance/visual.sdf and thruster_compliance/visual.sdf

example yamls:

sensor_num_fail will fail because too many cameras

wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: middle_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
wamv_3d_lidar:
    - name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}

sensor_bounding fail will fail because one of the cameras is not in bounds:

wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 2
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
wamv_3d_lidar:
    - name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}

sensors config will work:

wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
wamv_3d_lidar:
    - name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}

thruster_config will not fail:

engine:
    - prefix: "left"
      position: "-2.373776 1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "right"
      position: "-2.373776 -1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "middle"
      position: "-2.373776 0 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"

thruster_config_num_fail will fail due too too any engines

engine:
    - prefix: "aft_port"
      position: "-2.373776 1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "aft_star"
      position: "-2.373776 -1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "aft_center"
      position: "-2.373776 0 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "for_port"
      position: "1 .8 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "for_star"
      position: "1 -.8 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"

thruster_config_bounding_fail will fail due too bounding box:

engine:
    - prefix: "left"
      position: "-2.373776 1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "right"
      position: "-2.373776 -1.027135 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"
    - prefix: "middle"
      position: "2.373776 0 0.318237"
      orientation: "0.0 0.0 0.0"wamv

title.html: Issue#99 wamv compliance

* styling

wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv

      y: -0.2

    - name: p3d_wamv

```

thruster\_config will not fail:

```

    - prefix: "left"

    - prefix: "right"

* styling
* added roslaunch params

thruster bounding boxes visualized

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3286679424-thrusters.png)
  
sensor bounding boxes visualized

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/482578878-comp_show.png)

sensor\_compliance/visual.sdf and thruster\_compliance/visual.sdf
